item.title: Feudal Dawn Project
item.description: Teaching project, “Software Development” course, an educational innovation promoted by CEDIS at the University of Brasília.

item.title: Sergio Antônio Andrade de Freitas
item.description: Chair Professor at the University of Brasília (UnB), working in the undergraduate Software Engineering program and the Graduate Program in Applied Computing.

item.title: CEDIS Gamification Revolutionizes Software Teaching at FGA
item.description: Innovative gamification by Prof. Sergio Freitas engages Software Engineering students with a playful and effective approach.
